inclusion.criterion: solid pancreatic tumor masses by previous cross-sectional imaging techniques
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Signed informed consent for EUS with contrast-enhancement, elastography and EUS-FNA
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior surgical treatment with curative intent or chemo-radiotherapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients diagnosed with mucin producing tumors, pancreatic cystic tumors, etc.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD and recently noted abdominal mass. She presents with fevers/rigors and bandemia. CT abdomen without contrast showed a large heterogeneous left upper abdominal mass consistent with pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
